p: The aims of this study were to investigate if soy protein diet impacts NAFLD, and to identify if deficiency of Phb1 in mouse liver affects the pathogenesis of NAFLD. Because choline is a dietary methyl donor and is involved in remethylation ( 26), the CDD lowers methionine formation in animal livers by 20~25% and induces fatty liver ( 27). Therefore, we used CDD as a negative control for NAFLD deterioration when the methionine-deficient soy protein diet was ingested with choline removed.
